name: No Time To Wait
description:
No Time To Wait is a game about keeping your waiter balanced while also delivering more food than your opponent. Made for Games Fleadh 2017.

Team:

Matthew Murphy (Programming)

Vilius Drumsta (Programming)

Jhonata Miclos (Programming)

Jack Barrett (Art)

Artem Semenov (Art)

Controls (Xbox controler):

Left analog stick - Tilt player

A - Jump

B - Pick up food and serve tables

X - Use item
